original_text: You shall therefore obey the voice of the Lord your God, keeping his commandments and his statutes, which I command you today.”
korean_text: 그런즉 네 하나님 여호와의 말씀을 청종하여 내가 오늘 네게 명령하는 그 명령과 규례를 행할지니라

sentences.original_text: You shall therefore obey the voice of the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 너의 하나님 여호와의 음성을 청종해야 하리라

sentences.original_text: keeping his commandments and his statutes
